definition: variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: It is very smooth (Churchill used to enjoy similar wines from nearby Melnik).
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾也曾在附近的梅爾尼克品嚐過類似的酒。

sentences.english: Churchill found that subalterns were two a penny in India and invited nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾發現，在印度中尉多得不得了，沒人要。

sentences.english: Churchill began with short stories and moved to playwriting in college.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾開始短篇小說和劇本中轉移到學院。

sentences.english: Cameron strikes a Churchillian tone when he talks about the nation’s austerity plans.
sentences.chinese: 卡梅倫在談到國家的緊縮計劃時用的是丘吉爾的論調。

sentences.english: You're already at Churchill Downs to watch the horse race.
sentences.chinese: 你已經在丘吉爾唐斯賽馬場觀看賽馬了。

sentences.english: Winston Churchill was born in a ladies' room during a dance.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾出生在一個舞會的女廁所裏。

sentences.english: All agreed that the Churchills did not have the right to do what they had done.
sentences.chinese: 大家都同意出丘吉爾夫婦沒有權利那樣做。

sentences.english: The Churchill bushfire burnt out more than 30, 000 hectares of land.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾山火燒燬了超過3萬公頃的土地。

sentences.english: Churchill's is the most recognized one of the great orators and statesmen.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾是公認的最偉大的政治家和演說家之一。

sentences.english: The socialists were trying to smear churchill as a warmonger .
sentences.chinese: 工黨企圖誹謗丘吉爾先生是戰爭販子。

sentences.english: Michael Baze arrived at Churchill Downs with the right surname.
sentences.chinese: 邁克爾巴澤抵達丘吉爾唐斯姓的權利。

sentences.english: All agreed that the Churchills didn't have the right to do what they had done.
sentences.chinese: 人們一致認爲丘吉爾夫婦無權做他們已經做過的事情。

sentences.english: Churchill would even sleep here on occasions.
sentences.chinese: 有時候丘吉爾甚至睡在這裏。

sentences.english: Winston Churchill was born in a ladies' room during dance.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾出生在一個舞會的女廁所裏。

sentences.english: The portrait of Churchill brought Karsh international fame.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾的肖像的國際聲譽帶來了卡什。

sentences.english: Mr. Winant, the American Ambassador in London, saw Mr. Churchill last night.
sentences.chinese: 美國駐倫敦大使懷南特先生昨夜會見了丘吉爾。

definition: Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
(Claire) Chennault, commander of Flying Tigers during World War II
Winston Churchill (1874-1965), UK politican and prime minister 1940-1945 and 1951-1955/surname Churchill
